inclusion.criterion: opportunity to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: blood drawn and stored for measurement of Anti-TPO, Ca, PTH and inflammatory factors
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: chart review of preoperative thyroid U/S characteristics
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: postoperative histopathology evaluation by experienced pathologist
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of Hashimoto's thyroiditis based on histopathology and AntiTPO level
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: division into two groups: HT and control
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: comparison of prevalence of thyroid cancer in HT and control groups
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of previous radiotherapy to head and neck
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer with history of previous radiotherapy to head and neck, making them likely ineligible for the study.
